Bitcoin, as the first and most renowned cryptocurrency, has remained largely isolated from the innovations flourishing on other blockchains. NEAR's introduction of Chain Signatures represents not just a technical evolution but a strategic pivot towards a unified blockchain future. Here's an in-depth exploration into why this technology is pivotal.
